tool.name: CAMP intensities:

param.name: r
param.label: Region
param.help: A typical region looks like chr9:119,506,000-119,518,000 Leave blank if you prefer to extract the rs list supplied below.

param.name: rslist
param.label: rs list
param.help: List of rs numbers to select - cut and paste or type, use space delimiters. Leave blank if you prefer to extract a region supplied above.

param.name: cols
param.label: Columns to include
param.help: Select all columns you want returned

tool.help:
**Syntax**
- **Name** is the name to give the results file for this run - **Region** is the genomic region cut and paste from a UCSC browser location window. Leave this blank if you prefer to use an rs list - **rs list** is a space or newline delimited list of rs numbers. Leave this field blank if you prefer to use a region - **Genome Build** is the version of the genome your markers are from - use hg18 for CAMP illumina data - **Columns** are the pvalues and power values you want to save
Here's a long list of rs numbers from the CAMP/CostaRica replication if you want some valid markers for testing: rs1006368 rs1039603 rs1048329 rs10797666 rs10865745 rs11059460 rs1106349 rs11073206 rs11189833 rs1122401 rs11245330 rs11760243 rs12065553 rs12095496 rs12104793 rs12118987 rs12247820 rs12452392 rs12637875 rs12672614 rs1267818 rs12734338 rs12743401 rs1288548 rs12998999 rs13007239 rs13008209 rs13267437 rs1332776 rs1384607 rs1410600 rs1413077 rs1448961 rs1462920 rs1499417 rs1532673 rs1536506 rs1538549 rs1589968 rs17118897 rs174627 rs17580427 rs17786786 rs1873921 rs1880666 rs1894670 rs1901127 rs192448 rs1937787 rs1955747 rs2041127 rs2279607 rs2285781 rs2292005 rs2389016 rs2440154 rs2478872 rs2495717 rs2504705 rs261119 rs261125 rs261137 rs261159 rs261902 rs274962 rs2777899 rs2792103 rs2882586 rs3006014 rs3019330 rs3125524 rs319514 rs3734087 rs3752120 rs3812351 rs3820580 rs4128396 rs4129709 rs4130135 rs4140798 rs4341862 rs4376156 rs4490127 rs4575638 rs4611118 rs4719220 rs4740480 rs4806187 rs4862564 rs4865845 rs4890360 rs4930034 rs5746474 rs6477029 rs6667605 rs6704972 rs6711956 rs6728906 rs6729531 rs6859984 rs6864266 rs6864728 rs6893622 rs6993479 rs7018178 rs7045644 rs7216104 rs7513249 rs772503 rs7730653 rs7831051 rs7974630 rs7975535 rs8023818 rs876519 rs9320538 rs9322700 rs9404314 rs9463425 rs967244 rs10493662 rs7682957 rs1365640 rs12029757 rs9312239 rs42876 rs12352644 rs1041755 rs1217651 rs9474230 rs11901445 rs10814809
-----
**Summary**
This tool is a special purpose tool to cut specific columns (powers and pvalues) over a specified genomic region (given as a UCSC browser location - eg chr9:119,506,000-119,518,000) or from a list of selected rs numbers, from the CAMP illumina run of 2007. It takes a tab delimited file containing rs chrom offset float1..floatn and cuts out a region and a subset of the columns into a tabular file. If you make sure that RS is included, the result that appears in your history will have a direct link to ucsc genome graphs for viewing in full genomic context
